Uses of Class
org.apache.beam.sdk.io.FileBasedSource

  • Packages that use FileBasedSource 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io
    Defines transforms for reading and writing common storage formats, including AvroIO, and TextIO.

    • Uses of FileBasedSource in org.apache.beam.sdk.io

      Subclasses of FileBasedSource in org.apache.beam.sdk.io 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AvroSource<T>
      A FileBasedSource for reading Avro files.
      class  BlockBasedSource<T>
      A BlockBasedSource is a FileBasedSource where a file consists of blocks of records.
      class  CompressedSource<T>
      A Source that reads from compressed files.
      class  XmlSource<T>
      A source that can be used to read XML files.
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.io that return FileBasedSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract FileBasedSource<T> FileBasedSource.createForSubrangeOfFile(String fileName, long start, long end)
      Creates and returns a new FileBasedSource of the same type as the current FileBasedSource backed by a given file and an offset range.
      protected FileBasedSource<T> CompressedSource.createForSubrangeOfFile(String fileName, long start, long end)
      Creates a CompressedSource for a subrange of a file.
      protected FileBasedSource<T> XmlSource.createForSubrangeOfFile(String fileName, long start, long end) 
      FileBasedSource<T> FileBasedSource.createSourceForSubrange(long start, long end) 
      FileBasedSource<T> FileBasedSource.FileBasedReader.getCurrentSource() 
      protected FileBasedSource<T> TextIO.Read.Bound.getSource()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<? extends FileBasedSource<T>> FileBasedSource.splitIntoBundles(long desiredBundleSizeBytes, PipelineOptions options) 
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.io with parameters of type FileBasedSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> CompressedSource<T> CompressedSource.from(FileBasedSource<T> sourceDelegate)
      Creates a CompressedSource from an underlying FileBasedSource.
      static <T> Read.Bounded<T> CompressedSource.readFromSource(FileBasedSource<T> sourceDelegate, CompressedSource.DecompressingChannelFactory channelFactory)
      Creates a Read transform that reads from that reads from the underlying FileBasedSource sourceDelegate after decompressing it with a CompressedSource.DecompressingChannelFactory.
      Constructors in org.apache.beam.sdk.io with parameters of type FileBasedSource 
      Constructor and Description
      FileBasedReader(FileBasedSource<T> source)
      Subclasses should not perform IO operations at the constructor.
